entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 2.
